phrases: I will mail it within the week, so make sure you get it.
I am truly glad that I could write good calligraphy.
Ever since I came here, I have had all kinds of inspiration.
Naruka Competition Entry Star Artist: Handa Seishuu Name: Handa Sei Address, Phone: Kawafuji
The energy of nature is amazing!
Unlike in Tokyo, I have fun writing here.
Thank you for taking the time to come.
Is his writing coming along well?
Her certainly talks like it is.
Rather than producing the same beautiful writing as someone else,
I want Handa-kun to master calligraphy that only he could write.
Art that instantly brings him to mind when you see it.
Personally, I would like to have him back sooner,
but it seems he does not intend to return until he gets results at an exhibition.
Does he feel remorseful about hitting me?
If my forgiveness will persuade him to return,
then maybe it is time we have him come back.
Translation: Let us All Go Together
Does not he even care to listen to me?
I was talking big to Kawafuji,
Naruka Competition Entry Star Artist: Handa Seishuu Name: Handa Sei Address, Phone: Kawafuji
but is this really the one I should submit?
I think it is good calligraphy,
but on the whole, it feels like it was done on a whim.
Can I really call this calligraphy mine?
If it is calligraphy I could only write because I came to the island,
I do not know for sure if I could write the same way in Tokyo.
Even though it is an exhibition that will not reject my work,
should I really submit a piece I wrote on a whim?
It will not do any good to brood over it now.
Right now, my only weapon is the inspiration of nature.
If I anguish over whether it is my calligraphy, the deadline will...
Let us talk about what to play instead!
I am not playing with you.
I am a proud guy, and I am asking for your opinion.
Ya sure ya want to say that?
Ticket to do anything you say.
I should have given her a ticket for a shoulder massage instead.
So long as I have this, ya hafta do what I say!
No, I wrote one time on it.
We are pilin' up stones to make a wall.
Ya got to fit the stones together just right, or it will fall apart.
So it is like a puzzle!
Is he trying to casually talk me into helping?!
Sensei's huntin' for toads with me!
Ticket to do anything you say.
I will use this to get him to help me all day.
I will give ya something nicer, Naru.
It is a perfect skippin' stone!
Let us see, I will set this...
It is a real thrill when it fits perfectly.
I just may be suited for this kind of precise task.
The ones we piled up look a right mess,
an' I thought we would done good.
Yer real bad at this, Grampa!
While we are at it, how'bout we have Sensei handle that thing at the shrine?
What am I supposed to do here at the shrine?
These are the names of ev'ryone who donated when the shrine was built.
It is pretty much all the villagers from back then.
I was thinkin' it was'bout time we got it rewritten.
I would thought of askin' someone in town to handle the job,
but you would do it better, right?
but we will give ya a little something as thanks.
I do not need any money.
I was just thinking that it is been a while
since I wrote such orderly calligraphy.
There is room for one more name here.
So that people know who wrote it,
how'bout you add yer name, Sensei?
That will be just between us.
There is a phone call for you at the store.
That guy, after ignoring me earlier...
Here, take these to the house.
He said it was an important discussion.
My ticket to make him do anythin' I say...
I had not asked him anythin' yet,
What were you planning to ask him to do?
I want to go with Sensei to the festival,
and to the sports meet, too!
I think he would agree even if you did not use a ticket.
In that case, let us plan on going to the festival!
I want to wear a kimono!
Okay, let us invite Miwa-nee and Tama, too!
It will be a pain with those two around.
I am going with this one!
You have done well to endure my long training and come this far.
I have nothing left to teach you.
You both are certain to get gold prizes!
but will I really be okay?
After I wrote it with so much fighting spirit,
what if I do not get any prize at all?
Now I do not want to turn it in.
Your calligraphy is as good as anyone's!
In fact, I am more worried about myself.
I do not really know if the work I chose to exhibit is good or not...
Sensei, take us to the festival!
You actually know how to dress someone in a yukata?
I could even dress you in a real kimono.
You are coming to the festival too, right?
Okay, we are going too, so see ya there!
I guess I will go for a change of pace.
I-I am not happy about this or anything!
After all, it is my last day here.
I hardly ever went to any while I was in Tokyo.
Sei-san, let us go to the festival!
Handa, let us go to the festival!
Handa-kyun, let us go to the festival!
Especially since it is right before another exhibition...
That is the Goldfish Scooping I have heard about!
It is the gangst er, I mean, Miwa's dad.
I am helpin' out the commerce and industry association.
Huh, sounds like a lot of work.
Can you really scoop with this?
Sir, is not this scoop defective?!
Sensei, could you move aside for a moment?
For this, you cannot make a big splash.
as if the goldfish are asking to be scooped!
Iku-chan comin' by puts me in the red.
Though there are not no way she needs this many fish...
I was'bout to set a new record!
Ikuko lays waste to the goldfish scoopin' every single year.
I always taught her at the branch school.
I think he wants me to point out something,
You could not catch any goldfish.
It is a lot of work taking care of a pet, so I decided not to catch any.
Teams of four can win festival tickets based on the number of points they make.
We are on the same team.
If not for the middle schoolers blinded by their greed for tickets,
we would be certain to take first place.
Let us show'them that the softball team is invincible!
The air around them is dead...
Hey, is not Tama with you?
Tama went to buy a manga that came out today.
We hafta have four people to do this,
so I wish she would get back soon!
It is the Sensei we have heard about!
That Akki's awful brazen for a sixth grader.
Akki's got pretty high specs, despite his appearance.
Why is not it here on the release date?!
Are not it always like this?
You just hafta get one shot in!
You guys are too good at this!
Are not you on the softball team?!
It is'cuz we help out with the basketball team sometimes.
There are not many people, so there is plenty of give and take.
Do I have to do this?
I never thought this day would come, when I would reveal my hidden talent.
The winner is the Akki Squad!
They did well for grade schoolers!
I thought I could do it...
It are not much, but second place got us tickets,
so here is your share: 300 yen.
Can I really have this, even though I missed?
It is Tama's share, but since she are not here...
I asked you to reserve me a copy!
We will get another one soon.
What do you want to eat?
I will buy you anything you like.
Ya just said you will buy anything!
Do not assume all grown-ups have money!
Forget it, I will buy my own.
If ya want something, say so!
I will buy it for ya!
I cannot have a seven-year-old child spending money on me!
Why do not you get the yakisoba?
It will go towards the baseball club.
But I will just use these tickets to get three cotton candy.
Here is a nice big one.
Where do I start eating it from?
Will Sensei be all right in that crowd?
I hope he does not get cotton candy on anyone's clothes, or hurt himself with the chopsticks...
The fireworks display will begin at nine of the clock.
She said there is fireworks, Sensei!
Be careful not to get lost, you two!
Well, I do not like crowds,
so I spend every summer festival like this.
Not that I am one to talk, but you are wasting your youth.
Have you seen Naru and Hina
Since they took this road, they went to the beach.
It is time for the fireworks, so let us go together.
There is a good little-known spot.
Where are the softball team girls?
They are watchin' the fireworks with their boyfriends.
I wish they would blow up.
If I had one, I would not be cooking yakisoba.
I know, but I asked anyway.
Well, we have got the usual crew here.
After school starts, there will be a lot less time for fun.
By job, do you mean one on the island?
Well, there is still some time.
And even without you here, there will still be Sensei.
Ya sayin' Sensei can take my place?!
There is something I have to tell you.
What was Sensei tryin' to say just now?
Take a good look at him.
